name: Simple Tic Tac Toe (gabanciano)
description:
This is a very basic Tic-Tac-Toe game made with the help of Unity's UI! That's pretty much what it is. You can download the source code and full Unity project through my Github or Google Drive

Sound effects from Chiptone by sfbgames.

I recommend you don't put this on fullscreen. 😂
